casebody.data:
STATE
v.
KELLY. No. COA08-232. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed October 21, 2008. Certification Date November 10, 2008. Appeal from Wayne (06CRS57862, 06CRS57863, 06CRS57864, 07CRS1251).

Case reported without published opinion. No. 06CRS057862, count 51, breaking or entering: No error. No. 06CRS057862, count 52, breaking or entering: no error. No. 06CRS057863, count 51, larceny after breaking or entering: No error. No. 06CRS057863, count 52, larceny after breaking or entering: Judgment of conviction reversed and sentence vacated. No. 06CRS057863, count 53, misdemeanor larceny: Judgment of conviction reversed and sentence vacated. No. 06CRS057864, count 51, felony possession of stolen goods: Judgment arrested. No. 06CRS057864, count 52, felony possession of stolen goods: Judgment arrested. No. 06CRS057864, count 53, misdemeanor possession of stolen goods, judgment arrested.
